TensorsÂ¶

The tensor property holds a tensor for a point or a segment. Each tensor is defined by a tensor.Tensor. The TensorProperty.TensorProperty holds all the tensors for a point-cloud.

The TensorFactory.TensorFactory builds either a tensor (Tensor Class) object or a TensorProperty (Tensor Property).

Tensor FactoryÂ¶

class TensorFactory.TensorFactory[source]Â¶

Methods

static computeTensorsProperty_givenNeighborhood(points, neighborhoodProperty=None, neighborsFunc=None, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Compute tensors for a point cloud.

For each point a tensor is computed, with the point itself the reference point. If the neighborhoodProperty is None, it is computed here, according to the sent function.

Parameters

points â a point cloud (PointSet or sub-object)

Optionals

Parameters

  • neighborhoodProperty (NeighborhoodProperty) â a property that holds all neighbors for each point (can be empty)

  • neighborsFunc (function) â the function to be used for neighbors search.

  • kwargs â

    the arguments for the function to be used for neighbors search. These are usually:

    param radius

    search radius for neighbors search

    param knn

    k nearest neighbors for neighbors search

Returns

a tensor property with all tensors computed for each point

Return type

TensorProperty

Usage

Warning

Now works only for PointSet3D neighborhood search.

classmethod tensorFromPoints(points, point_index=-1, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Create a Tensor from 3D points

Parameters

  • points â PointSet

  • point_index â around which point index the tensor is computed. If (-1) the tensor is computed around the center of gravity. Default (-1).

Optionals

Parameters

radius â the radius according to which weights are being computed (if not set, then unit weight is used)

Returns

TensorProperty object

Return type

Tensor

classmethod tensorGeneral(arrays, ref_array=-1, weights=1, min_points=3)[source]Â¶

Compute a general tensor (not necessarily 3D)

Parameters

  • arrays (np.array) â an nxm arrays (each row array is the set for the tensor)

  • ref_array (np.array) â the array around which the tensor is computed, if (-1) it is computed around the center of gravity

Optionals

Parameters

  • weights â the weights for the tensor computation. Default 1 for all

  • min_points (int) â minimal number of points that can define a tensor (default: 3)

Returns

a tensor

Return type

Tensor

Note

If there are less than min_point the covariance matrix of the tensor will be defined as the Identity matrix (with the required shape)
